name: merge
signature: <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A | E, never, R>
description:
Combines both success and error channels of an effect into a single outcome.
*Details This function transforms an effect that may fail into one that always returns
a value, where both success and failure outcomes are handled as values in the
success channel.
*When to Use This can be useful when you want to continue execution regardless of the
error type and still capture both successful results and errors as part of
the outcome.
*Example
